Name: MindSweeper
About the game: Mind Sweeper, it is a game that combines Minesweeper and RPG element. Chaos descends upon the world and transforms creatures into monsters... As a hero, you need to use your unique perception to sweep away chaos and defeat monsters, collect companions to fight against Boss, and ultimately protect the world from chaos. Use minesweeper way to explore the map and interacting with special objects on the map. You can also collect monsters with different abilities to strengthen your team and defeat the boss.
